message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI 

This paper proposes a transfer learning scenario that involves audio-visual grounding and speech recognition. The paper discusses the use of deep learning models for this purpose, which is a common theme in the computer science sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of image and speech data, which falls under the sub-categories of computer vision (cs.CV) and speech processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of features extracted from different layers of the deep learning models, which is a common theme in the sub-category of signal processing (cs.SD). Finally, the paper discusses the use of transfer learning, which is a common theme in the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.LG, and cs.AI, in that order.
